nodes.text: Star Wars Droids: Rebellion 3 is the third issue of Star Wars Droids: Rebellion, a Dark Horse Comics comic book series starring R2-D2 and C-3PO. It was published on June 13, 1995 by Dark Horse Comics.

Trapped on a drone barge headed for a recycling center, See-Threepio is about to have his memory wiped clean! Artoo races to rescue his old pal, but will Threepio even recognize the plucky little droid by the time he arrives?
An automaton bearing some superficial resemblance to a Dalek can be seen in the bottom right corner of the cover.
